Hotels.name: Riad Dar Alhambra
Hotels.adress: 33, Zaouiat Lahdar, Marrakech  Medina, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
This 16th-century riad offers a rooftop terrace with views of the Koutoubia and the Atlas Mountains. You can relax in the traditional lounges or walk the 20 minutes to Ben Youssef Mosque and Marrakesh Train Station.

The rooms and suites at Riad Dar Alhambra feature traditional, Moroccan architecture and views of the interior courtyard. While each one is air-conditioned, some also provide a seating area, fireplace or spa bath.

The continental breakfast and drinks can be enjoyed on the terrace, in the lounges or in the dining room. The hosts can also prepare regional cuisine accompanied with live music, if you reserve in advance.

Spa facilities include massages, a hammam and beauty treatments, all available upon prior reservation. You can also arrange an excursion or an airport transfer at the riad’s 24-hour reception.

Hotels.name: Riad Penelope
Hotels.adress: 43 Derb Chentouf Quartier Riad Laarouss, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Set in Marrakech, 300 m from Le Jardin Secret, Riad Penelope offers accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Featuring a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The riad features an indoor pool, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the riad all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with pool view. The units feature a safety deposit box.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Riad Penelope.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Mouassine Museum, The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech and Boucharouite Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 8 km from Riad Penelope, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels.Description:
Riad SidiFatah is decorated in traditional Moroccan style and situated in the heart of the Medina. Located in the jeweller’s quarter, it is only a 10 minute walk from the ocean.

All the rooms at Riad SidiFatah are air-conditioned and have ensuite facilities. Free Wi-Fi access is also available.

Guests can sample authentic Moroccan cuisine at the hotel, on advanced request. Centrally located, this Riad is a great starting point for exploring the nearby souks, hammam and surrounding region.

Hotels.name: Hostel Marrakech Rouge
Hotels.adress: Riad Rue Zitoun el Jdid, Derb Zinka Dika, 40, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
The guest rooms at Hostel Marrakech Rouge are simply decorated and have shared bathroom facilities. The hostel proposes both individual rooms and dormitory accommodation.

Moroccan cuisine can be served in the dining room, on the terrace or in the courtyard upon request, and on-site cookery classes can be arranged. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed in the morning.

The hostel proposes a 24-hour reception and free luggage storage. The property is 800 m from the Almoravid Koubba, 950 m from the Ben Youssef madrasa and 7 km from Marrakech Menara Airport.

Hotels.name: Riad Noumidya
Hotels.adress: Blad Lamsfer, Villa Rezaki, N°3 Route d'Imouzer, 30000 Fès, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Located in Fès, 6 km from Royal Palace Fes, Riad Noumidya provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The riad has a garden and offers a terrace.

At the riad, each room is equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and bathrobes, all units at Riad Noumidya have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a seating area. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at Riad Noumidya can enjoy a continental or a à la carte breakfast.

Nouvelle Ville is 5 km from the riad, while C.C.I.S Fes is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Fès–Saïs Airport, 9 km from Riad Noumidya.

Hotels.name: Dar Tafantant
Hotels.adress: Village Tafantant, Route de Tahanaout, 42000 Ourika, Région de Marrakech, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Featuring a terrace, Dar Tafantant offers rooms in Marrakech, 43 km from Menara Gardens and 45 km from Bahia Palace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi. The guest house has a garden and provides an outdoor swimming pool.

A Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the guest house.

Dar Tafantant offers a hammam. You can play darts at the accommodation.

Koutoubia Mosque is 45 km from Dar Tafantant, while Mouassine Museum is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 46 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels.name: Dar Arij
Hotels.adress: 8 Rue Imam Chafii Lamtafi , Marchane, 90040 Tangier, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
This property is 17 minutes walk from the beach. Dar Arij in Tangier provides accommodation with free WiFi, 2.2 km from Tangier Beach, 300 m from Forbes Museum of Tangier and 1.2 km from Dar el Makhzen. The property is 5 km from Tanger City Mall and 7 km from Ibn Batouta Stadium.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Kasbah Museum is 1.3 km from the apartment, while American Legation Museum is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Tangier Ibn Battouta, 13 km from Dar Arij, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
Hotels.facilities:
Airport shuttle
Non-smoking rooms
Free WiFi
Parking

Hotels.name: Hotel Les Ambassadeurs
Hotels.adress: 35 Rue Pierre Parent, Sidi Belyout, 20250 Casablanca, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Hotel Les Ambassadeurs provides rooms with private balconies in the centre of Casablanca. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms.

All units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Hotel Les Ambassadeurs each room includes bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Les Ambassadeurs include Central Market of Casablanca, Ancient Medina of Casablanca and Casablanca Cathedral. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

Hotels.name: Dar El Karam
Hotels.adress: 5 Rue Lalla Hannou, Rabat Medina, 10030 Rabat, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Boasting a shared lounge, Dar El Karam offers accommodation in Rabat, 1.2 km from Kasbah of the Udayas and 2.3 km from The National Library of the Kingdom of Morocco. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms.

A shared bathroom is at guests' disposal in all rooms, while selected rooms also boast a DVD player.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Barid Al Maghrib, Moroccan Parliament and Goethe-Institut. The nearest airport is Rabat-Salé Airport, 10 km from Dar El Karam.

Hotels.name: APPARTEMENT HAUT STANGING AU COEUR DE GUELIZ
Hotels.adress: MARRAKECH, GUELIZ, Hivernage, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, living room, flat-screen TV and fully-equipped kitchen.

Majorelle Gardens is 2 km from the apartment, while Yves Saint Laurent Museum is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 3 km from APPARTEMENT HAUT STANGING AU.

Hotels.name: Riad Layla Rouge
Hotels.adress: Rue El Ksour, Derb Rokni 23, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Riad Layla Rouge provides suites and dormitory rooms. With a colourful decoration, all accommodations have air conditioning and heating. You will have access to shared or private bathroom facilities.

A Moroccan breakfast is included and served each morning in the dining room and evening meals can be enjoyed, upon prior reservation. A kitchen is also available to guests.

Excursions, massages, cooking classes and airport transfers can be organised, with an additional cost. Riad Layla Rouge is equipped with free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Free WiFi

Hotels.name: Sunny Apartments Taghazout
Hotels.adress: Sidi Said Oulad Street 28, Taghazout , 80022 Taghazout, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
This property is 3 minutes walk from the beach. Providing city views and free WiFi, Sunny Apartments Taghazout provides accommodation conveniently set in Taghazout, within a short distance of Taghazout Beach, Madraba Beach and Panorama Point Surf Spot.

All units come with a terrace with sea views, a kitchen with a fridge and a stovetop, and a private bathroom with bidet. There is a seating and a dining area in all units.

A car rental service is available at the bed and breakfast, while hiking can be enjoyed nearby.

Anchor Point Surf Spot is 1.9 km from Sunny Apartments Taghazout. The nearest airport is Agadir–Al Massira, 47 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels.name: Hiking Nomads Guesthouse
Hotels.adress: Gorges du Dadès, 45150 Tamellalt, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Hiking Nomads Guesthouse has a bar and a terrace in Tamellalt. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features room service, a shared lounge and organising tours for guests.

The rooms at the hostel are fitted with a seating area. Certain rooms come with a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and an oven. At Hiking Nomads Guesthouse rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Hiking Nomads Guesthouse.

Kalaat MGouna is 27 km from the hostel, while Boumalne is 9 km from the property.

Koutoubia Mosque is 45 km from Dar Tafantant, while Mouassine Museum is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 46 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels.name: Dar Arij
Hotels.adress: 8 Rue Imam Chafii Lamtafi , Marchane, 90040 Tangier, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
This property is 17 minutes walk from the beach. Dar Arij in Tangier provides accommodation with free WiFi, 2.2 km from Tangier Beach, 300 m from Forbes Museum of Tangier and 1.2 km from Dar el Makhzen. The property is 5 km from Tanger City Mall and 7 km from Ibn Batouta Stadium.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Kasbah Museum is 1.3 km from the apartment, while American Legation Museum is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Tangier Ibn Battouta, 13 km from Dar Arij, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels.name: Hotel Les Ambassadeurs
Hotels.adress: 35 Rue Pierre Parent, Sidi Belyout, 20250 Casablanca, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Hotel Les Ambassadeurs provides rooms with private balconies in the centre of Casablanca. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms.

All units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Hotel Les Ambassadeurs each room includes bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Les Ambassadeurs include Central Market of Casablanca, Ancient Medina of Casablanca and Casablanca Cathedral. The nearest airport is Mohammed V International Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

Hotels.name: Dar El Karam
Hotels.adress: 5 Rue Lalla Hannou, Rabat Medina, 10030 Rabat, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Boasting a shared lounge, Dar El Karam offers accommodation in Rabat, 1.2 km from Kasbah of the Udayas and 2.3 km from The National Library of the Kingdom of Morocco. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms.

A shared bathroom is at guests' disposal in all rooms, while selected rooms also boast a DVD player.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Barid Al Maghrib, Moroccan Parliament and Goethe-Institut. The nearest airport is Rabat-Salé Airport, 10 km from Dar El Karam.

Hotels.name: APPARTEMENT HAUT STANGING AU COEUR DE GUELIZ
Hotels.adress: MARRAKECH, GUELIZ, Hivernage, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, living room, flat-screen TV and fully-equipped kitchen.

Majorelle Gardens is 2 km from the apartment, while Yves Saint Laurent Museum is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 3 km from APPARTEMENT HAUT STANGING AU.

Hotels.name: Riad Layla Rouge
Hotels.adress: Rue El Ksour, Derb Rokni 23, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Riad Layla Rouge provides suites and dormitory rooms. With a colourful decoration, all accommodations have air conditioning and heating. You will have access to shared or private bathroom facilities.

A Moroccan breakfast is included and served each morning in the dining room and evening meals can be enjoyed, upon prior reservation. A kitchen is also available to guests.

Excursions, massages, cooking classes and airport transfers can be organised, with an additional cost. Riad Layla Rouge is equipped with free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Hotels.name: Sunny Apartments Taghazout
Hotels.adress: Sidi Said Oulad Street 28, Taghazout , 80022 Taghazout, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
This property is 3 minutes walk from the beach. Providing city views and free WiFi, Sunny Apartments Taghazout provides accommodation conveniently set in Taghazout, within a short distance of Taghazout Beach, Madraba Beach and Panorama Point Surf Spot.

All units come with a terrace with sea views, a kitchen with a fridge and a stovetop, and a private bathroom with bidet. There is a seating and a dining area in all units.

A car rental service is available at the bed and breakfast, while hiking can be enjoyed nearby.

Anchor Point Surf Spot is 1.9 km from Sunny Apartments Taghazout. The nearest airport is Agadir–Al Massira, 47 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels.name: Taj Atlas Wellness Boutique Hôtel & Spa
Hotels.adress: Route d'Amizmiz km 47, Lalla Takerkoust, 42202, Marrakech, Maroc, 42202 Amizmiz, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Situated in Amizmiz, Taj Atlas Wellness Boutique Hôtel & Spa has a restaurant, bar, garden, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bath and a hairdryer, all rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also boast a seating area. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at Taj Atlas Wellness Boutique.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace.

Marrakech is 49 km from Taj Atlas Wellness Boutique Hôtel & Spa, while Ourika is 42 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 47 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels.name: Riad Dar Alhambra
Hotels.adress: 33, Zaouiat Lahdar, Marrakech  Medina, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
This 16th-century riad offers a rooftop terrace with views of the Koutoubia and the Atlas Mountains. You can relax in the traditional lounges or walk the 20 minutes to Ben Youssef Mosque and Marrakesh Train Station.

The rooms and suites at Riad Dar Alhambra feature traditional, Moroccan architecture and views of the interior courtyard. While each one is air-conditioned, some also provide a seating area, fireplace or spa bath.

The continental breakfast and drinks can be enjoyed on the terrace, in the lounges or in the dining room. The hosts can also prepare regional cuisine accompanied with live music, if you reserve in advance.

Spa facilities include massages, a hammam and beauty treatments, all available upon prior reservation. You can also arrange an excursion or an airport transfer at the riad’s 24-hour reception.

Hotels.name: Riad Penelope
Hotels.adress: 43 Derb Chentouf Quartier Riad Laarouss, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Set in Marrakech, 300 m from Le Jardin Secret, Riad Penelope offers accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Featuring a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The riad features an indoor pool, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the riad all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with pool view. The units feature a safety deposit box.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Riad Penelope.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Mouassine Museum, The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech and Boucharouite Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 8 km from Riad Penelope, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotels.adress: 12 Rue Benacer Lakrari, Rabat Medina, 10000 Rabat, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Riad SidiFatah is decorated in traditional Moroccan style and situated in the heart of the Medina. Located in the jeweller’s quarter, it is only a 10 minute walk from the ocean.

All the rooms at Riad SidiFatah are air-conditioned and have ensuite facilities. Free Wi-Fi access is also available.

Guests can sample authentic Moroccan cuisine at the hotel, on advanced request. Centrally located, this Riad is a great starting point for exploring the nearby souks, hammam and surrounding region.

Hotels.name: Hostel Marrakech Rouge
Hotels.adress: Riad Rue Zitoun el Jdid, Derb Zinka Dika, 40, Medina, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
The guest rooms at Hostel Marrakech Rouge are simply decorated and have shared bathroom facilities. The hostel proposes both individual rooms and dormitory accommodation.

Moroccan cuisine can be served in the dining room, on the terrace or in the courtyard upon request, and on-site cookery classes can be arranged. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed in the morning.

The hostel proposes a 24-hour reception and free luggage storage. The property is 800 m from the Almoravid Koubba, 950 m from the Ben Youssef madrasa and 7 km from Marrakech Menara Airport.

Hotels.name: Riad Noumidya
Hotels.adress: Blad Lamsfer, Villa Rezaki, N°3 Route d'Imouzer, 30000 Fès, Morocco
Hotels.Description:
Located in Fès, 6 km from Royal Palace Fes, Riad Noumidya provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The riad has a garden and offers a terrace.

At the riad, each room is equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and bathrobes, all units at Riad Noumidya have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a seating area. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at Riad Noumidya can enjoy a continental or a à la carte breakfast.

Nouvelle Ville is 5 km from the riad, while C.C.I.S Fes is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Fès–Saïs Airport, 9 km from Riad Noumidya.
